about_the_game:
Purchasing this DLC will download the PDF file of Connor (phase I) of the wizard from the witch forest.

This series will introduce the adventures of wizard Connor, and introduce the world outlook setting of the game, as well as the plot and character setting not released in the game.

The game plot and character setting are supplemented.

The DLC is the first issue of this series.
